CustomField.description: Total available capacity which is sum of total available plan, design, build, test, UAT, deploy & support capacity
CustomField.formula: Total_Plan_Capacity__c + Total_Design_Capacity__c + Total_Build_Capacity__c + Total_Test_Capacity__c + Total_Deploy_Capacity__c + Total_UAT__c + Total_Adapt_Ongoing_Support_Capacity__c
CustomField.label: Total Available Capacity
